summary: Strict Mode infeasible due to an inconsistent segment isolation specification: maxIsolationBuckets is smaller than the earliest reconnect time, so the segment cannot remain isolated long enough to reach the allowed reconnection window.

rankedRepairs.rationale: Smallest mission-safe change that restores consistency without changing mission availability windows or action admissibility.
Alternative if isolation must be capped at 8 buckets; may increase risk if reconnect happens earlier.
